name: HEADLINER
description: Short, thought-provoking adventure where you are a News Editor and decide what stories get published, set in a fictional city where most people are genetically modified. Multiple unique endings let you share your story and see what the Headliner before you did.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Duo 2Ghz+ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win10 Processor: Intel i5+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 670 or newer DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
